alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 8:24PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL COMANCHE COUNTY... At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over eastern Fort Sill, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Elgin, Geronimo, Fletcher, Sterling, Medicine Park, Faxon, Fort Sill, Lake Ellsworth and Lake Lawtonka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
